iep_goals: Demonstrate appropriate conversational turn-taking in 4 out of 5 opportunities
Identify and use coping strategies during moments of frustration in 3 out of 4 trials

interviews.parent: Parent reports Mia enjoys music and art, and prefers predictable daily schedules.
interviews.teacher: Mia is polite and cooperative but struggles with peer interactions.

observations.psychologist: Strong academic skills; social communication differences consistent with autism.
